typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Contract_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Execution_Date as string,
		Termination_Date as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Contract_Value as string,
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Contract_Type_Code as string,
		Executed_By_Entity1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity3 as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Contract_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Execution_Date as date,
		Termination_Date as date,
		Company_Name as string,
		Contract_Value as decimal(19,4),
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Contract_Type as string,
		Executed_By_Entity1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity3 as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalContract
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type_Code,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3,
		StagingChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalContract derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Execution_Date,Termination_Date,Company_Name,Contract_Value,Contract_Currency,Contract_Type,Executed_By_Entity1,Executed_By_Entity2,Executed_By_Entity3)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Contract_ID = Contract_ID,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Execution_Date = Execution_Date,
		Relation_Termination_Date = Termination_Date,
		Relation_Company_Name = Company_Name,
		Relation_Contract_Value = Contract_Value,
		Relation_Contract_Currency = Contract_Currency,
		Relation_Contract_Type = Contract_Type,
		Relation_Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity1,
		Relation_Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity2,
		Relation_Executed_By_Entity3 = Executed_By_Entity3,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndNumber derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Execution_Date,Termination_Date,Company_Name,Contract_Value,Contract_Currency,Contract_Type_Code,Executed_By_Entity1,Executed_By_Entity2,Executed_By_Entity3)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Contract_ID == Relation_Contract_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingContract@NewContract select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type_Code,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Contract_ID = toInteger(Contract_ID),
		Execution_Date = toDate(Execution_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Termination_Date = toDate(Termination_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Contract_Value = toDecimal(Contract_Value, 19, 4, "###,###.##")) ~> ConvertDatesAndNumber
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingContract@(NewContract, ChangedContract, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingContract@ChangedContract derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID = Relation_Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type_Code,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Contract_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Execution_Date as date,
		Termination_Date as date,
		Company_Name as string,
		Contract_Value as decimal(19,4),
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Contract_Type as string,
		Executed_By_Entity1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity3 as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Contract_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Contract_Type_Code,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Contract_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Execution_Date as string,
		Termination_Date as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Contract_Value as string,
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Contract_Type as string,
		Executed_By_Entity1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Contract_Type_Code as string,
		Contract_Type as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalContractType
ValidatedDateAndNumber@ValidDateAndNumber, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidContractType@ValidContractTyoe select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndNumbers split(not(isNull(Derived_Contract_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Execution_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Execution_Date)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Termination_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Termination_Date)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Contract_Value)),not(isNull(Derived_Contract_Value)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedDateAndNumber@(ValidDateAndNumber, InvalidDateOrNumber)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Contract_ID = toInteger(Contract_ID),
		Derived_Execution_Date = toDate(Execution_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Termination_Date = toDate(Termination_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Contract_Value = toDecimal(Contract_Value, 19, 4, "###,###.##")) ~> ConvertDateAndNumbers
InvalidDateOrNumberErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrNumber
ValidatedDateAndNumber@InvalidDateOrNumber derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Contract ID / Execution Date / Termination Date / Contract Value")) ~> InvalidDateOrNumberErrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrNumber, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidContractType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalContractType lookup(Contract_Type == Relation_Contract_Type_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalContractType
RelationalContractType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Contract_Type_Code = Contract_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalContractType
LookupRelationalContractType split(not(isNull(Relation_Contract_Type_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidContractType@(ValidContractTyoe, InvalidContractType)
IsValidContractType@InvalidContractType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Contract Type Code")) ~> InvalidContractTypeErrormessage
InvalidContractTypeErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidContractType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Contract_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Execution_Date as string,
		Termination_Date as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Contract_Value as string,
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Contract_Type_Code as string,
		Executed_By_Entity1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity3 as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type_Code = Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		features as (type as string, properties as (Asset_Id as string, Fund_Id as string, OBJECTID as string, Property as string, Crop_Type as string, Plant_Year as string, State as string, Area_Ha as double, SHAPE_Leng as double, SHAPE_Area as double), geometry as (type as string, coordinates as string))[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	backslashEscape: true) ~> geojsonmodified
geojsonmodified derive({_corrupt_record} = toString(byName('_corrupt_record')),
		type = toString(byName('type')),
		Asset_ID = features[1].properties.Asset_Id) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 sink(input(
		Version_Name as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Date as string,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Update_datetime as string,
		record_deleted_flag as string,
		process_name as string,
		insert_update_flag as string,
		Budget_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['abc.txt'],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
